item.title: tabbed
item.description: tabbed documentation. Manual installation DEPRECATED: git clone https://github.com/a2n-s/tabbed ~/repos/tabbed cd ~/repos/tabbed git checkout main make clean install One can also refer to the GitHub repo. -------------------------------------------------------------------- Go back to the doc or the front page.
item.content:
tabbed documentation.

Manual installation DEPRECATED:

git clone https://github.com/a2n-s/tabbed ~/repos/tabbed
cd ~/repos/tabbed
git checkout main
make clean install

One can also refer to the GitHub repo.

--------------------------------------------------------------------

Go back to the doc or the front page.
